problem:
VS = float(random.randrange(30,50,2))/10
VOL = VS/10 VIL = 9*VS/50 VIH = 41*VS/50 VOH = 45*VS/50
The inverter shown must meet the static discipline:
\(0 \leq V_{OL} < V_{IL} < V_{IH} < V_{OH} \leq V_S\)
The required discipline is: \(V_{OL}=$VOL\)V, \(V_{IL}=$VIL\)V, \(V_{IH}=$VIH\)V, \(V_{OH}=$VOH\)V, and \(V_{S}=$VS\)V.
The graph shows the input/output behavior of the inverter, given the S-model (perfect switch model) of the MOSFET.
For what values of the MOS threshold \(V_T\) can the design satisfy the static discipline?
What is the minimum possible value of \(V_T\) (in Volts)?
What is the maximum possible value of \(V_T\) (in Volts)?
